docs.lead_paragraph: A Connecticut firefighter says in a federal civil rights lawsuit that she was unfairly disciplined by a city fire department and forced to take unpaid leave because she was pregnant.

headline.main: Firefighter Sues Over Pregnancy-Related Sick Days
headline.print_headline: Firefighter Sues Over Pregnancy-Related Sick Days

docs.snippet: A Connecticut firefighter says in a federal civil rights lawsuit that she was unfairly disciplined by a city fire department and forced to take unpaid leave because she was pregnant.

docs.lead_paragraph: Teen girls who have sex should use IUDs or hormonal implants — long-acting birth control methods that are effective, safe and easy to use, the nation's most influential pediatricians' group recommends.

headline.main: Pediatricians Urge IUDs or Implants for Teen Girls
headline.print_headline: Pediatricians Urge IUDs or Implants for Teen Girls

docs.snippet: Teen girls who have sex should use IUDs or hormonal implants — long-acting birth control methods that are effective, safe and easy to use, the nation's most influential pediatricians' group recommends.
